grade_comment:
Grade: 90

Comment: The response effectively identifies and explains Daniel 7:13-14 as the Old Testament reference contributing to the understanding of the 'Son of Man' as the coming Messiah. The connection between this passage and Jesus' self-identification as the Son of Man in the New Testament is clearly articulated. The student demonstrates a solid understanding of how this Old Testament prophecy is fulfilled in Jesus Christ. Great job overall!
